daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A NYC woman was tragically killed by a flying solar panel during a nor'easter, while the city faces significant challenges including a slow adoption of modern literacy curricula in schools, potential strikes by Broadway musicians, and a bleak budget outlook as Governor Hochul campaigns for reelection.

### Civics & Politics

- MetroCards will be phased out as NYC's transit payment method after three decades. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
